title: Why do ‘they’ keep silver cheap? And what would happen if the didn’t?
description: Most  honest financial experts know that the dollar as the world’s reserve currency will eventually end (think BRICS, Saudi’s accepting Juan as payment, etc).  The only question is when.  A decade or even more seems to be what I read most often.  After readin…
